about_the_game:
About

In the fictional world, populated by antropomorphic beasts, there is cruel TV-show. The participants of the show are sent to the dangerous island to compete, survive and win the big money prize.
"Jaws & Claws" is a mix of such genres like 2D-platformer, fighter, beat'em up, party game. Gameplay is full of fights, gunfire, movement and rivalry.

DEMO version features

Available game modes:
- Island (Story mode, 4 regions 6 levels each are available, 1 or 2 players)
- Fast match (up to 8 players/AI, Free for All, 8 arenas)
- Rabbidball (sports mode, football/basketball analogue, 2 teams)
- Practice (mode to practice moves and combos)
- Tutorial (game basics is shown here)


Playable characters available: Crocco, Buzz, Kong Jr., Iggy.

FULL version/h2]
Available game modes:
- Island (14+ regions, 80+ stages)
- Fast match (up to 8 players/AI, Free for All, lots of stages)
- Team Brawl (2-4 teams of players/AIs, lots of stages)
- Rabbidball (sports mode, football/basketball analogue, 2 teams, lots of stages with various rules)
- Survival (1 or 2 players must survive agints waves of enemies)
- Boss Raid (small team engages the mighty bosses)
- Head to Head (classic fighter mode, player vs player, or player vs AI)
- Practice (mode to practice moves and combos)
- Tutorial (game basics is shown here)

Playable characters available: Crocco, Buzz, Kong Jr., Iggy, Rhino, Frosty, King, Mini, Jabber, Lupin, Catsu-Hero, Bosch, Tenrek, Sever.

IMPORTANT INFO


Jaws & Claws is being created by two people. We will appreciate your help in making the game better.
We will be waiting your feedback. Thank you!
Hope, this DEMO is enjoyable for you, so you want to try the full version when it's out!

name: Jaws & Claws Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron J4125
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570R
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In the fictional world, populated by antropomorphic beasts, there is cruel TV-show. The participants of the show are sent to the dangerous island to compete, survive and win the big money prize. Genre: platformer, beat'em up, fighter, party game. Up to 8 players multiplayer.
